channel.title: Comments on: Dublin – The world’s tech hot spots – CNET.com

item.title: By: Paul Campbell
item.dc:creator: Paul Campbell
item.description: If any of you under 25s are out there and want to meet up and talk about generating business and doing business, thinking big, making positive change etc. please get in touch. It seems that there are very few opportunities for young people in Ireland outside of company employment and helping making wealthy corporations even wealthier. I feel myself getting older by the day (just turned 24) and I'd like to use my youth to my advantage.
item.content:encoded: If any of you under 25s are out there and want to meet up and talk about generating business and doing business, thinking big, making positive change etc. please get in touch. It seems that there are very few opportunities for young people in Ireland outside of company employment and helping making wealthy corporations even wealthier. I feel myself getting older by the day (just turned 24) and I’d like to use my youth to my advantage.
